title: Ping An's OneConnect Seeks to List in New York in Mid-November -Reuters
text:
--Ping An Insurance's OneConnect financial technology unit is seeking a New York listing in mid-November to raise up to $1 billion with a valuation of about $8 billion, Reuters reported, citing an unnamed source.

--The company was earlier planning to launch the IPO as early as this month, but the listing timetable could change, subject to market conditions and investor response, Reuters said.

Full story: https://reut.rs/2kW2SCt
